title: Fawad wishes nation a happy Independence Day
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 14 (APP):Federal Minister for Information Chaudhry Fawad Hussain on Saturday wished the nation a Happy Independence Day.
قوم کو جشن آزادی کی ڈھیروں مبارک! خدا اس پرچم کو سلامت رکھے امن اور خوشحالی پاکستان کے عوام کا مقدر بنے اور آزادی کی نعمتیں تاقیامت میسر رہیں آمین
— Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) August 13, 2021
In a tweet, the minister prayed to Allah Almighty to keep this flag safe, and peace and prosperity be the destiny of the people of Pakistan. He prayed that people of Pakistan enjoy the blessings of freedom forever.
